com.github.astefanich.broker.simple

Class SimpleBroker

  • Object
    • SimpleBroker
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Broker, ExchangeListener, EventListener

    public final class SimpleBroker
extends Object
implements Broker, ExchangeListener, EventListener
    Implementation class of Broker interface; used by investors to create and access their account, and to obtain quotes and place orders.
    Author:
    AndrewStefanich
    See Also:
    Broker, AccountManager, StockExchange

      Locate an account with the broker.

      • createAccount

        public Account createAccount(String accountName,
                             String password,
                             int balance)
                      throws BrokerException
        Create an account with the broker. Operations are performed by the appropriate AccountManager and the corresponding DAO.
        Specified by:
        createAccount in interface Broker
        Parameters:
        accountName - the user or account name for the Account
        password - the password for the new Account
        balance - the initial account balance in cents
        Returns:
        the new Account
        Throws:
        BrokerException - if unable to create the Account

      • getAccount

        public Account getAccount(String accountName,
                          String password)
                   throws BrokerException
        Locate an account with the broker. The username and password are first verified and the account is returned. Operations are performed by the appropriate AccountManager and the corresponding DAO.
        Specified by:
        getAccount in interface Broker
        Parameters:
        accountName - the user or account name for the account
        password - the password for the account
        Returns:
        the Account
        Throws:
        BrokerException - if username and/or password are invalid

           throws BrokerException
